title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 505.2 - False signals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 505.2 - False signals

State Regulations

Except for the purpose of any authorized and previously
publicized test or drill, any person who shall willfully issue or disseminate a
false civil defense warning or signal, or shall willfully simulate an official
civil defense signal, shall be guilty of a felony as provided in subdivision 4
of section 101 of the New York State Defense Emergency Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
505.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
